pages.text: private events No matter the occasion, groups large and small, let us help you plan your next celebration in our beautiful space. THE MOST BEAUTIFULLY DESIGNED BAR IN SOUTH CAROLINA - Architectural Digest A DESTINATION Named ‚ÄúThe Most Beautifully Designed Bar in South Carolina‚Äù by, Vintage Lounge is an upscale Charleston bar offering the finest selection of drinks. We feature more than twenty wines by-the-glass and a bottle list with over 200 selections, sure to satisfy any palate. Our offerings focus on small production wines typical of place and varietal character, and feature producers who believe in a hands-off approach to making wine. Many of our wines are certified organic or practice viticulture organically, biodynamically, or in a natural and respectful way. Architectural Digest In addition to our expansive wine selection, we pride ourselves in offering proper cocktails - both classic and original creations - and a small selection of local craft beer in can form. Our beverage offerings are the perfect compliment to our curated selection of specialty cheeses and charcuterie to complete Charleston, SC‚Äôs most intimate night out! Vintage Lounge is located on Upper King Street in a beautifully renovated historic building. In addition to our award winning interiors, we feature a spacious outdoor patio and bar so that you and your guests can take in all that Charleston has to offer. Vintage Lounge is without question Charleston‚Äôs best upscale bar for both date night & group outings! Recently featured in the likes of the , , , and .
